## Discussion

Use an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder] instance’s methods to set up a single compute pass. The encoder this method returns dispatches its compute commands serially (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDispatchType/serial]). To create a compute command encoder that dispatches commands concurrently (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDispatchType/concurrent]), use the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/makeComputeCommandEncoder(dispatchType:)] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/makeComputeCommandEncoder(descriptor:)] method.

# makeComputeCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Creates a compute command encoder that uses default settings.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeComputeCommandEncoder() -> (any MTLComputeCommandEncoder)?
```

## Discussion

Use an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder] instance’s methods to set up a single compute pass. The encoder this method returns dispatches its compute commands serially (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDispatchType/serial]). To create a compute command encoder that dispatches commands concurrently (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDispatchType/concurrent]), use the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/makeComputeCommandEncoder(dispatchType:)] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/makeComputeCommandEncoder(descriptor:)] method.

## Creating compute encoders

- **makeComputeCommandEncoder(descriptor:)**: Creates a compute command encoder from a descriptor.
- **makeComputeCommandEncoder(dispatchType:)**: Creates a compute command encoder with a dispatch type.
- **MTLDispatchType**: The type of dispatch method to use when calling encoded functions.
